message: You may qualify for the Startup India Seed Fund. Your profile matches early-stage founder requirements.
Your startup fits PMEGP's criteria for manufacturing/service founders with subsidy benefits.
You qualify for CGTMSE: collateral-free loans up to ₹2 Cr.
Your founder profile qualifies for Stand-Up India loans between ₹10 lakh–₹1 Cr.
You are eligible for Mudra Tarun loans (₹5–₹10 lakh).
Your startup fits the Biotechnology Ignition Grant (BIG) eligibility—₹50 lakh grant.
Your deep-tech idea may qualify for TIDE 2.0 grants up to ₹40 lakh.
You may qualify for NIDHI PRAYAS—prototype funding up to ₹10 lakh.
Your Karnataka startup is eligible for Elevate grants up to ₹50 lakh.
You qualify for TN Capital Subsidy—up to ₹150 lakh support.
